title: PYTHON PANDAS & NUMPY
description: Welcome to Day 1! Dive into Pandas for seamless data handling and NumPy for powerful numerical computing. Master data manipulation and unleash Python's potential for analysis.

title: DATA VISUALIZATION
description: Day 2 awaits! Explore Matplotlib and Seaborn to craft captivating visualizations. From basic plots to interactive dashboards, learn to tell stories with data.

title: DATA PREPROCESSING
description: Day 3 is here! Clean, transform, and prep your data like a pro. Discover techniques for handling missing values, standardizing features, and more. Get ready to optimize your data for analysis and modeling.

title: DATA Analysis
description: Welcome to Day 4! Dive deep into the heart of data analysis. Learn powerful techniques to extract insights, uncover patterns, and make informed decisions.📊🔍💡

title: DATA Analysis using "R"
description: Day 5: Data Analysis with R Welcome to Day 5! Today, we delve into the realm of data analysis using R. Uncover insights, manipulate data, and perform statistical modeling with ease. Harness the power of R's extensive libraries for a deeper understanding of your data. Let's analyze like never before! 📊📈🔍

title: DATA SCIENCE "PROJECT"
description: Day 6: Data Science Project Welcome to Day 6! It's project day – your chance to apply everything you've learned throughout this bootcamp. Dive into a real-world data science project, where you'll tackle challenges, explore insights, and showcase your skills. Let's turn theory into practice and unleash your creativity! 🚀🔬💻

title: Linear Regression
description: This is Week 2, Day 1, and the IOTA Club is gearing up for your Linear Regression session. Fasten your seatbelts, and prepare to launch into the world of ML! add one  more line. Get ready to unravel the power of linear relationships! . Let's decipher the trends and predict the future, one equation at a time! 🚀🔬💻

title: Logistic Regression
description: Welcome to Week 2, Day 2! Today, we're diving deep into logistic regression – a powerful technique for binary classification. Learn how to model the probability of a binary outcome and make predictions with confidence. From understanding the logistic regression equation to implementing it in Python or R, prepare to unravel the intricacies of this fundamental machine learning algorithm. Let's sharpen our classification skills and pave the way for more sophisticated models!📈🔍🤖 🚀🔬💻

title: K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN)
description: Welcome back to Week 2, Day 3! Today, we're diving into K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN), an intuitive yet powerful algorithm for classification and regression tasks. Learn how KNN works by finding the nearest neighbors to a given data point and making predictions based on their class or values. From choosing the optimal value of K to understanding its strengths and limitations, get ready to explore the ins and outs of this versatile algorithm. Let's expand our machine learning toolkit and unlock new possibilities with KNN! 🤝🔍📊

title: Decision Tree & SVM
description: Welcome to Week 2, Day 4! Today, we explore Decision Trees and Support Vector Machines (SVM).Learn how Decision Trees partition data for decision-making, offering transparency. Then, dive into SVM, a versatile algorithm for classification tasks, finding optimal decision boundaries.Master these techniques to enhance your machine learning arsenal and solve complex problems effectively! 🌳🤖🔍
